DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study whether Acetazolamide effective prevention contrast nephropathy
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Effect Acetazolamide NaHco3 Prevention Contrast Nephropathy
DOC.detailed_description: Contrast induce nephropathy one common cause acute renal failure many preventive protocol exist . 240 patient underwent coronary angiography randomly divide three groups.Group 1,2,3 receive Bicarbonate , Acetazolamide+Normal salin Normal salin respectively.We compare prevalence contrast nephropathy group .
